SEARCH

Package MedicineInventorySystem

package MedicineInventorySystem
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminInventoryPrompt
    The AdminInventory class provides an interface for administrators to manage the medication inventory.
    InventoryController
    The InventoryController class serves as the central controller for managing medication inventory.
    InventoryLoader
    The InventoryLoader class is responsible for loading medication inventory data into the system.
    InventorySaver
    The InventorySaver class handles saving medication inventory data from the system to persistent storage.
    InventoryViewer
    The InventoryViewer class is responsible for displaying the current medication inventory.
    LowStockChecker
    The LowStockChecker class is responsible for monitoring and alerting about medications in the inventory that are below their defined alert levels.
    MedicationInventory
    The MedicationInventory class represents a medication item in the inventory with attributes such as name, current stock level, and alert level for low stock warnings.
    MedicineInventoryService
    The MedicineInventoryService class provides functionality for managing medication inventory data, including loading, saving, formatting, writing, and converting data to and from MedicationInventory objects.
    StockAdjuster
    The StockAdjuster class is responsible for managing stock adjustments (increase or decrease) of medications in the inventory.
